questions.question: What is the empirical formula of α-AEPF-14?
questions.answer: C29 H24 F6 Mg N2 O8

questions.question: At what temperature range does the first weight loss occur in the TGA profile of β-AEPF-14?
What is the main residue identified by XRPD in the TGA analysis of AEPF-16?
Does the IR spectrum of AEPF-17 show bands in the -OH stretching mode region?
questions.answer: Yes, a broad band centred at ~3435 cm-1 is determined.

questions.question: What is the crystal system of AEPF-15?
How many water molecules are removed in the first weight loss step of the TGA profile for AEPF-16?
Is the space group of β-AEPF-14 Pnna?
What is the percentage of decomposition for AEPF-17 according to its TGA profile?
Does the IR spectrum of AEPF-16 show bands associated with the -CH stretching mode of L(2)-2 and phen aromatic groups?
questions.answer: Yes, a weak band centred at ~3085 cm-1 is observed.

questions.question: What is the final mass loss percentage in the TGA profile of α-AEPF-14?
What is the crystal system of AEPF-17?
What is the empirical formula of AEPF-15?
questions.answer: C46 H26 F12 Mg N2 O8

questions.question: What is the space group of AEPF-16?
Does the TGA profile of β-AEPF-14 show a weight loss due to the removal of phen ligand?
questions.answer: Yes, two consecutive weight losses of total 32% correspond to the removal of phen ligand.

questions.question: What is the percentage of decomposition for α-AEPF-14 according to its TGA profile?
What is the main residue identified by XRPD in the TGA analysis of AEPF-17?
Does the IR spectrum of AEPF-15 show bands in the -OH stretching mode region?
questions.answer: Yes, bands centred at ~3535 cm-1, ~3405 cm-1 and ~3230 cm-1 are observed.

questions.question: What is the empirical formula of AEPF-16?
questions.answer: C29 H20 F6 Mg N2 O6

questions.question: What is the space group of AEPF-15?
Does the TGA profile of AEPF-16 show a weight loss due to the removal of coordinated water molecules?
questions.answer: Yes, a first weight loss of ~5.7% is consistent with the removal of the coordinated water molecules.
